mapper.insert: insert into itemorder (iid, ocode, uid, pid, pname, mainImage, finalprice, camount, totalprice, createTime, updateTime) values (#{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ocode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mainimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{finalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{camount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: update itemorder set ocode = #{ocode,jdbcType=BIGINT}, uid = #{uid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pid = #{pid,jdbcType=INTEGER}, pname = #{pname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, mainImage = #{mainimage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, finalprice = #{finalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, camount = #{camount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, totalprice = #{totalprice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, createTime = #{createtime,jdbcType=DATE}, updateTime = #{updatetime,jdbcType=DATE} where iid = #{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select iid, ocode, uid, pid, pname, mainImage, finalprice, camount, totalprice, createTime, updateTime from itemorder where iid = #{iid,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select iid, ocode, uid, pid, pname, mainImage, finalprice, camount, totalprice, createTime, updateTime from itemorder
